title: godoc' output text isn't well to read
body:
I'm thinking godoc' output text isn't well to read. section titles are upper case
strings. But it does not have indent spaces, so I get lazy to read.
How about insert 2 or 4 indent spaces into the left?

before
https://gist.github.com/1375555 

after
https://gist.github.com/1375564
